1.content: after a hard day kyle feels queezy and falls on his bed...... in the morning he wakes up but feels different what kind of person did he wake up as?
1.title: the start

12.content: Does reality change with it
12.title: cheerleader

121.content: When you wake up you fell kinda strange but you walk it of when you go take a shower you look in the mirror and how do you react
121.title: Yes

1211.content:
You faint and when you wake up again, you have another look at your body in the mirror. You get a shock to see that you’re a full female…You have no clue what and why this happened…
As you leave the bathroom to go back to your room, you still feel weird everywhere…
Still not having any kind of clue what is going on here, you decided to start slowly for now and move around in your new room, which you find also changed: You must see girly stuff around, which causes even more confusion for you!
Everything was becoming stranger and stranger every moment. You continue to look around in the room and find massive wardrobe next to the door into a hall. Next to the wardrobe was a kind of vanity table with all kinds of feminine things on it.
Suddenly you are interrupted by mom calling for you, at least your mom was the same….
“Kylie, breakfast is ready!" mom called out.
Kyle, now called Kylie was shocked at just being called by the female pronunciation of his name, that wasn’t his name, but it was somehow…
It took A few more seconds, but then he realized what had happened even if he had no idea why or how, but as a matter of fact he was now a girl: that's why he had breasts, that's why the room looked girlish and that's why now his mum had called him Kylie…
1211.title: Faint

choices: Wish you wouldn't dress like a tomboy?
12112.content:
You get another shower then go into your old room and see it's sort of feminine white and pale pink with a few posters on the walls.

You see a few trophies and realise there for cheerleading, you realised you starting to get cold so you go into your closet and after searching for awhile you find some jeans and a top then pick up you school bag.

You then go downstairs to have breakfast and you mum says?
12112.title: dressing

12113.content: He was just walking down when "her" phone started ringing who was it
12113.title: something else

121132.content:
In the reality before this strange gender change he had a girlfriend, but what will be now. Damn, Kylie has and will find it out now, by taking the call:
“Hi Ashley” she said, still not used of having a melodic soprano girls voice now.
“Hi Kylie, I just wanted to remind you to bring your swimwear for the big beach party event in the afternoon!” Ashley said, for now Kylie could not find out about any difference, because they agreed to go there together, so no change here so far…
121132.title: Ashely (girlfriend)

131.content:
All of sudden, there was this flash of light.
Every thing went black for a minute, next thing u know, u cant move your body and some how u on the kitchen table. There was a mirror right in front of u.
U look at see??
131.title: An inanimate object

1311.content:
Why a candy bar, i hope this is a dream.
U try to figure this out, until u hear footstep.
All of a sudden u where picked up. U are look into the face of
1311.title: Candy bar

13111.content:
It was your sister that picked u up, u try to scream at her, but that wasn't working. Then she set u down for a moment, while she pour her a drink.
She picked u and her drink back up and headed back up stairs to her room.
She set u down on her computer stand and started her homework.
After awhile just sitting there u here a knock on her door
13111.title: Sister susan

133.content: Kyle realizing things are different quickly runs to the mirror and staring back at him is the reflection of a?
133.title: Human

info.description:
every time kyle goes to sleep he swaps lives with someone will he ever get back
no body else notices the difference but he slowly changes into the other person (mind and body) if he can resist the changes by the end of the day he will go on to the next body hopefully hell reach his own again
